detail_desc: Shorts in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip at the back and raw-edge hem. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with lacing at the sides, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a visible zip at the front, side pockets and legs that flare to the hem.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
Strappy top in a textured weave with a deep V-neck front and back, spaghetti shoulder straps and narrow horizontal ties at the back. Satin lining. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline, wide shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and slits in the sides.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and chunky soles.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.

Wide, calf-length dress in airy silk chiffon with covered elastication around the neckline for a gathered effect front and back. Voluminous raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, three-strand necklace made up of different metal chains, the longest with a round pendant. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Metal ear cuffs and earrings in various designs. Six ear cuffs, one pair of earrings and two single earrings. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Short, one-shoulder dress in a sturdy patterned weave with draping at the top, gathers on one shoulder and a wide frill around the armhole. Gathers, light draping and zips in the sides. Jersey lining.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Calf-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide ribbed waistband containing a concealed key pocket, and legs with ventilating mesh sections.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders, a tabs and press-stud at the top and a diagonal zip. Zipped front pockets, a zip at the cuffs and a contrasting colour lining.

Tailored trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, discreet side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a ribbed section inside the back of the waistband and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Calf-length kaftan in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. V-neck, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lace border around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Narrow metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with smocking at the top, a seam under the bust and short sleeves.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a woven cotton blend with embroidery. Elastication and a short frill trim at the top and 3/4-length, elasticated sleeves with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a decorative knot at the hem, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with an appliqué on the front and adjustable hook and loop fasteners at the front and ankle. Imitation suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.

Backpack in nylon with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded mesh back plate. Lined. Size 13x28x57 cm (when open).
Long T-shirt in jersey with a washed look, with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Straight-cut shirt in cotton twill with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs, and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Polo shirt in premium cotton slub jersey with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue and shimmering metallic heel caps. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Lace top with a small, scallop-edged stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the back of the neck and a yoke at the top. Long, wide sleeves with scallop-edged cuffs, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a high collar, raglan sleeves and knitted frills around the collar and cuffs.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.

Fitted, knee-length lace dress with a round neckline at the front and a deep V-neck and concealed zip at the back. Cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.

Wide trousers in soft washed denim with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight-cut legs with creases at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a frill trim at the hem and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Yoga jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lined bust with removable inserts. Seam at the waist with a cut-out section at the front and 3/4-length legs with long ties at the hems that tie around the calves.
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a knit containing some wool with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Super Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a wide lace-trimmed neck.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and legs and press-stud fasteners.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a slightly higher, elasticated, drawstring waist and stripes down the sides.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative bow and moccasin seam at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Twill linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Calf-length, voluminous balloon skirt in cotton poplin. Regular waist with covered elastication and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted body in jersey with a V-neck at the front and a low-cut back. Elbow-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
